name: Holy Moly Houseplant
description:
A game about growing roots through Mr. Sad Mole's house, made for Global Game Jam 2023!

Controls & Info: 

  • Click on the flower pot to sprout new roots. New roots can also be clicked (at the tip!) to split them up.
  • Your mouse will guide the roots. Bring them to nourishment, and see what happens!
  • WASD to pan the camera and explore the house.
  • R to reset the game.

By: Aaron Freedman, Diego Garcia, Noël Clark, Jake Jefferies and Nina Freeman.
